title: tjtonmoy
author: tjtonmoy
content: "In order to be successful, you have to find out what makes you excited. What makes you wanna get up each morning and go to work? If you love what you do and dedicate yourself to your work, you will gain that momentum and each success will create another success. Never quit, never give up. Do something you love. When you do something that you love, you'll never fail. What you are going to do is give it a shot again and again and again. You're ultimately going to be successful." - Donald John TrumpSome say he's an Idiot but something he says sometimes makes sense. LOL. What do you think about it? Is it some way to manipulate people or that's the right thing to do?

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: We all wishes to do what will make us happy and even as that we still finds ourselves in the midst of things that doesn't make us happy yet we are only adjusting to it, look clearly there are some people who only works for working sake not because they are happy working it but is because they had no option than just to keep working till the required Job or offices that makes them happy comes forth. In other words, what I am trying to say is that when what would make us happy is not there we should always try to utilize the little we have and to keep hoping for the better ones to come, already from the part of my country out of 89 percent of people aren't happy with what they are doing but yet are still working harder to make sure they achieved what makes them happy. Note "the only way to go forward is to move forward' so for we to be happy we create happiness by ourselves instead of depending on the government or anyone else out there.

comments.author: Twentyonepaylots
comments.body: Nothing is wrong with his statement, it's true! Do what makes you excited, dedicate time and effort. Success has a lot of recipes and one of them is being happy, why do I say so? because you may achieve a lot of things but can't be happy at the end of the day, you may sleep in the nicest bed in the world, take yourself with a fancy car, swim with your money, and still not be contented with it. Being a successful person can be measure with physical things at first glance but is measureless beneath. So if you want to be successful, just dedicate your time to what you love the most, could be your job, your passion, your talent anything and you'll be successful some day that's for sure.

comments.author: topbitcoin
comments.body: The measure of each person's success is of course different, but in principle the process of success is of course the same, not giving up easily, not easily broken, being enthusiastic and getting back up on failed steps, these are the things that every human being must have, there are many ways for people to achieve success but not There are also many people who can survive the process they are going through, there are many indications that can make us successful, one of which is consistency in what we are trying to do and a life partner who complements it. Of course, it will make it easier for us to achieve success in what we are planning. Moreover, we must be ready to go through stairs that will stop us from carrying out the process, so that's where our self-confidence is tested so that we remain consistent in what has been designed from the start until we are able to achieve ultimate success.

comments.body: In order to be successful? In order to be successful, you must have a plan on which you can work. Instead, you should not do what makes you excited, because I am excited when new movies or series come out; I am excited while playing games with my friends, watching cricket, or reading the news, or gossiping with friends. But these types of excitement will not take me towards success.I have to follow a path that might not be followed by everyone. For example, on a single bench in school, there are two students, one of whom is a doctor and the other is a taxi driver. They both had the same opportunities and resources. One had a plan and knew the world was changing and he had to change himself now, while the other was enjoying the world and thinking that life is short, but he didn't think that even if life is short, everyone has to play their role in society by providing some type of service.

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: I've made it no secret that I am an United States citizen, and that I also think Donald Trump is a raging Buffon, but what "he" says here I certainly agree with.  However like most things with Donny boy, he didn't write it.  This same type of statement has been stated, said, quoted for countless decades, well before Trump was ever born.  Just like his books, he didn't write this.  This was something he read and stole, like most things. And honestly, as much as I love to hate on him..this is not my bias speaking here, it's just the truth.  Lastly..I do agree and I do love what I do. It makes life so much better, as I've been on the other side of the coin, and life is miserable if you hate what you do.  Never stop trying to find something you at least like!

comments.author: NeilLostBitCoin
comments.body: His statement is not wrong, but it's vital to recognize that each person's journey is unique. Achieving success can take varying amounts of time, whether it's a few months, years, or even decades. The key to success is persistence and not giving up on your goals. as there is always a chance for success. Happiness comes from doing what you love, which keeps you motivated on your goals.

comments.author: Stepstowealth
comments.body: Quote from: tjtonmoy on September 29, 2023, 05:40:46 PMSome say he's an Idiot but something he says sometimes makes sense. LOL. What do you think about it? Is it some way to manipulate people or that's the right thing to do? People have said many things and shared many experiences what they see as the path to success from their own personal experience. Donald Trump is not wrong, he is saying what has been practical for him and giving results to him, success has to come from conscious effort that is repeated consistently over time to bring result. But it is not the only way to success, there are many paths to success, you just have to choose and dedicate yourself to one strategy from one very successful person.
